pre_caption: The video opens from a first-person viewpoint, positioning a black assault rifle in the bottom center foreground. A building with an external staircase occupies the left side, stretching from the foreground to the middle ground, where a small enemy figure stands at the top of the stairs in the center. A dark green military vehicle is situated in the center-right middle ground, adjacent to stacked crates. Game interface elements, such as a minimap in the bottom left and health/ammo displays in the bottom right, are fixed in the foreground, while objective markers are distributed across the middle ground. The camera then pulls back and shifts slightly right, transitioning the view into an enclosed space filled with wooden scaffolding that occupies the foreground and middle ground. Light filters through openings in this structure from the background. The rifle remains in the bottom center foreground, now angled slightly upward, as the positions of the objective markers in the middle ground update. Throughout the sequence, the camera maintains an eye-level perspective of the unseen player.

Human-Written Description for Scenery: **A first-person POV shot, as if through the character’s eyes holding a dark gray firearm, shows an outdoor, urban setting during the daytime. A dark green armored vehicle is visible in the distance, positioned near stacked wooden crates on the dusty ground. The perspective then moves backward, entering a more enclosed area characterized by wooden scaffolding or debris, with light filtering through gaps in the structure.
